snippet: Clowney, the top pick in the 2014 draft, has been troubled by injuries the last two seasons. Watt’s absence has given him a chance to shine....
lead_paragraph: Clowney, the top pick in the 2014 draft, has been troubled by injuries the last two seasons. Watt’s absence has given him a chance to shine.

headline.main: With J.J. Watt Out, Jadeveon Clowney Is Stepping In
headline.print_headline: Clowney Makes Most of Chance to Step Up
